about_the_game: You managed to escape.. Phew. But where are you now? What a strange street?.. After meeting Kili in chapter 2, you escaped from the warehouse. It was dark outside and you noticed how you found yourself on an unknown street. Old houses, strange sounds. Try to find a way out of this place. After all, it seems that you have very unpleasant news. We advise you to hurry up. Kili was building something very terrible. You will again have to look at the terrible consequences of Degeons Intertaiment's experiments on Kili. Your thoughts will become more and more confused by what you have seen. What's going on anyway?.. Remember, he always follows you.
detailed_description: You managed to escape.. Phew. But where are you now? What a strange street?.. After meeting Kili in chapter 2, you escaped from the warehouse. It was dark outside and you noticed how you found yourself on an unknown street. Old houses, strange sounds. Try to find a way out of this place. After all, it seems that you have very unpleasant news. We advise you to hurry up. Kili was building something very terrible. You will again have to look at the terrible consequences of Degeons Intertaiment's experiments on Kili. Your thoughts will become more and more confused by what you have seen. What's going on anyway?.. Remember, he always follows you.
name: Night Project - Chapter 3
short_description: Continuation of the stories of the Night Project game. In chapter 3, you will meet Kili again, but in a completely different atmosphere. Kili will become even smarter. Find even more items that will help you solve the greater mystery of Degeons companies. Pre-order is available now!
